# These must return HTTP 200 after deployment

# Homepage
/

# Core Pages
/about/
/projects/
/blog/

# Book Section
/books/waltzing-through-chaos/

# Feeds
/rss.xml
/atom.xml

# Static Assets
/terminal.css
/terminal.js

# 404 Page (should return 200 when accessed directly)
/404.html
